episodes.title: ANC's The Weekend Wrap: PH envoy confirms US wants Quiboloy extradited on trafficking, fraud
episodes.description:
The Philippine president is getting furious as the floodgates open on the systemic corruption in flood control projects. With billions of pesos suspected to have been pocketed by a few, lawmakers are now under the spotlight as they plan next year's finances. This is ANC's The Weekend Wrap!

episodes.title: Quiboloy lawyer denies KOJC involvement in threat to Pasig City RTC | ANC
episodes.description:
Security at the Pasig Regional Trial Court (RTC) was significantly tightened on Thursday after several judges received online threats. Among the high-profile cases being heard at the Pasig RTC is the case of Pastor Apollo Quiboloy, who is facing a human trafficking case.

Philippine National Police's Acting Director For Police Community Relations PBGen. Roderick Alba  talks about the latest on their operations inside the Kingdom of Jesus Christ compound in the search for fugitive pastor Apollo Quiboloy.

episodes.title: PNP maintains presence in KOJC compound amid search for Quiboloy | ANC
episodes.description:

episodes.title: Socorro LGU seeks help from national gov't to relocate 3,000 suspected cult members | ANC
episodes.description:
Dateline Philippines: The local government of Socorro is seeking assistance to relocate over 3,000 members of suspected cult the Socorro Bayanihan Services Incorporated who have been occupying a protected forest area in the town.
